channel.title: Can anyone tell me how to make ranging work?
channel.description: Like making it so the range stat actuly helps in pking...i put my range to 999999 fired at something it still hits 10s..can anyone help??

item.title: Can anyone tell me how to make ranging work?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You increase the power of a weapon, instead of changing your stats.

Go to Item.Cfg and change the bonus.

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone tell me how to make ranging work?
